video_prompt: A young woman gently reaches towards a white butterfly. A large bird soars overhead, leaving contrails in the soft blue sky. Vines subtly creep up wire fences and concrete, as tree branches sway lightly.
image_prompt: Anime girl, blonde bob, blue eyes, black V-neck, white socks, sitting on concrete ledge, low-angle, white butterfly on hand, overgrown wire fence, tangled vines, urban decay, tree branches, bird in sky, soft blue sky, white clouds, tranquil, wistful.
refined_video_prompt: A young woman gently extends her arm, fingers reaching towards a fluttering butterfly. An overhead bird dynamically soars, its contrails appearing and dissipating in the sky. Vines subtly creep, gradually altering surfaces, while tree branches lightly sway.
